original_text: A very big crowd had come together to watch the men die. They saw what had happened. Then they began to go home. They were very sad, and they were hitting their own bodies with their hands.
korean_text: 이를 구경하러 모인 무리도 그 된 일을 보고 다 가슴을 치며 돌아가고

sentences.original_text: A very big crowd had come together
Then they began to go home
and they were hitting their own bodies with their hands
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신들의 몸을 손으로 치고 있었다
